body: Support the boycott of 2014 Olympic Games in Sochi and invoke political and economic sanctions against illegitimate regime led by Putin. Russian citizens suffer from a wide spectrum of human rights violations inflicted by the “lawmakers” installed thru fraudulent elections and Putin’s police forces. Today Russia violates many international/UN treaties. Persecution on political grounds, activists imprisoning, censorship and mass media manipulations stripped Russian people’s ability to participate in civil movement and political processes making it impossible to overthrow illegal regime via a national referendum. Therefore we think that the Olympic Games in Sochi will be viewed by the world community as a gesture of approval of the criminal and dangerous policy of the ruling elite in Russia.
title:
Boycott 2014 Russian Olympics in Sochi. 
--
Invoke sanctions against human right abusers and illegitimate ruling junta.
